Pre-Game Insights: India and Afghanistan will face each other in match number 9 of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi today. This will be the second match for both the teams in the 2023 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India and Afghanistan have played only three One Day Internationals (ODIs) against each other. The Men in Blue have registered two wins over Afghanistan, while one match ended in a tie.
Others: The match between India and Afghanistan will begin at 2 pm today.
India vs Afghanistan: Head-to-head record in ODIs
2018: Afghanistan tied with India at 252 runs
